title: Scapegoat Sister Vs Second Prince - Novel Updates
tags: Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Farming   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Nobles   Royalty   Secret Identity   Younger Love Interests
author: riki   rotoio
description:
The second prince has come of age. To celebrate the advent of such an occasion, the search for a suitable bride began. My younger sister was expected to go to the Royal Palace as a candidate. However, despite this, she eloped the day before her departure. I, the older sister she left behind, looked almost exactly like her â€“ so much that we were often mistaken for twins...

One month, right? For just one month, shall I substitute in for my sister?>
